video.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
video.synopsis: Siblings Katara and Sokka wake young Aang from a long hibernation and learn he's an Avatar, whose air-bending powers can defeat the evil Fire Nation.

episodes.synopsis: Katara and Sokka make a startling discovery while fishing: a boy frozen in an iceberg, perfectly preserved and -- amazingly -- alive.
episodes.title: The Boy in the Iceberg

episodes.synopsis: An accident results in Aang's expulsion from the Southern Water Tribe, and the villagers soon find themselves beset by sinister Prince Zuko.
episodes.title: The Avatar Returns

episodes.synopsis: Aang returns to his childhood temple, hoping to find evidence that his people still thrive in the region, but he makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: The Southern Air Temple

episodes.synopsis: Aang, Sokka and Katara go to the island of Kyoshi, where they receive a chilly reception. After Aang proves he's the Avatar, he becomes a celebrity.
episodes.title: The Warriors of Kyoshi

episodes.synopsis: Sokka and Katara must again indulge Aang when he drags them to the Earth Kingdom city of Omashu, another favorite haunting ground of his youth.
episodes.title: The King of Omashu

episodes.synopsis: Aang and the others find an Earth Kingdom mining town under the thumb of the Fire Nation, and Katara feels guilty when her actions lead to an arrest.
episodes.title: Imprisoned

episodes.synopsis: Aang takes on the task of defending a town from an interdimensional monster, but his untested skills and uncertainty could prove the town's undoing.
episodes.title: Winter Solstice: Part 1: The Spirit World

episodes.synopsis: During the winter solstice, Aang must travel into the Fire Nation -- which wants to capture him -- to communicate with his predecessor, Avatar Roku.
episodes.title: Winter Solstice: Part 2: Avatar Roku

episodes.synopsis: While teaching Aang about waterbending, Katara realizes her skills are inadequate. Luckily, she comes across a waterbending scroll at a boutique.
episodes.title: The Waterbending Scroll

episodes.synopsis: A band of rebel guerillas with a charming, roguish leader rescues Aang, Sokka and Katara as they're fleeing the Fire Nation's minions.
episodes.title: Jet

episodes.synopsis: Arriving at a giant gorge, Aang and his friends encounter two feuding refugee groups fighting over the right to cross the abyss.
episodes.title: The Great Divide

episodes.synopsis: When Aang, Katara and Sokka find themselves broke, Katara urges Sokka to take a fishing job. But the plan goes awry when the angler recognizes Aang.
episodes.title: The Storm

episodes.synopsis: With Sokka and Katara still ailing from the effects of the storm, Aang must find some frozen frogs to cure his cohorts.
episodes.title: The Blue Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Aang, Sokka and Katara come across a village that's dependent on its resident fortune-teller, who has reliably predicted its future for generations.
episodes.title: The Fortune-Teller

episodes.synopsis: Aang acts childish during a reunion between Sokka, Katara and a longtime friend. Fearing that Sokka and Katara will desert him, Aang betrays them.
episodes.title: Bato of the Water Tribe

episodes.synopsis: Aang and the others slip into a Fire Nation town so he can observe firebending firsthand. But their plans go quickly wrong, and they must seek refuge.
episodes.title: The Deserter

episodes.synopsis: On their continuing journey north, Aang and the others hear rumors about a surviving band of airbenders, requiring a visit to the Northern Air Temple.
episodes.title: The Northern Air Temple

episodes.synopsis: After going to the home of the Northern Water Tribe, Aang and Katara search for a waterbending master, and Sokka becomes smitten with a princess.
episodes.title: The Waterbending Master

episodes.synopsis: After hunting his prey halfway around the world, Adm. Zhao zeroes in on Aang's location and prepares to lay siege to the entire Northern Water Tribe.
episodes.title: The Siege of the North: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Adm. Zhao's army continues its assault on the beleaguered Northern Water Tribe, Sokka, Katara and Yue try to retrieve Aang from the spirit world.
episodes.title: The Siege of the North: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Aang and the group meet an Earth Kingdom general who wants to use Aang's powerful "Avatar State" as a weapon to defeat the Fire Nation.
episodes.title: The Avatar State

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Omashu, the kids become lost in the treacherous "Cave of Two Lovers."
episodes.title: The Cave of Two Lovers

episodes.synopsis: Aang enters Omashu so he can learn Earthbending from King Bumi, but the city is in the hands of the Fire Nation.
episodes.title: Return to Omashu

episodes.synopsis: When the kids end up in a mysterious and strange swamp, their fears are exposed.
episodes.title: The Swamp

episodes.synopsis: Aang must clear up a wave of anti-Avatar sentiment and atone for something he did in the past.
episodes.title: Avatar Day

episodes.synopsis: Aang discovers a possible Earthbending mentor at an underground tournament.
episodes.title: The Blind Bandit

episodes.synopsis: Traveling without uncle Iroh now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy.
episodes.title: Zuko Alone

episodes.synopsis: As the kids are pursued relentlessly by a mysterious machine, their exhaustion puts them at each other's throats.
episodes.title: The Chase

episodes.synopsis: When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher.
episodes.title: Bitter Work

episodes.synopsis: A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover secrets to use against the Fire Nation.
episodes.title: The Library

episodes.synopsis: Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert.
episodes.title: The Desert

episodes.synopsis: Aang escorts some refugees to Ba Sing Se through the deadly "Serpent's Pass," only to discover a plot by the Fire Nation that threatens the city.
episodes.title: The Secret of the Fire Nation

episodes.synopsis: Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them.
episodes.title: City of Walls and Secrets

episodes.synopsis: This series of short stories highlights different characters and their individual adventures in the city of Ba Sing Se.
episodes.title: Tales of Ba Sing Se

episodes.synopsis: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen.
episodes.title: Appa's Lost Days

episodes.synopsis: While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.
episodes.title: Lake Laogai

episodes.synopsis: The kids battle Long Feng and the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city.
episodes.title: The Earth King

episodes.synopsis: A guru at the Eastern Air Temple helps Aang take the next step in his Avatar journey. Sokka meets his long lost father.
episodes.title: The Guru / The Crossroads of Destiny

episodes.synopsis: After sustaining serious injuries at the end of Season 2, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.
episodes.title: The Awakening

episodes.synopsis: To better camouflage themselves as real Fire Nation citizens, the kids check out a Fire Nation school. Also, Zuko confronts Uncle.
episodes.title: The Headband

episodes.synopsis: When the gang comes to a suffering fishing village, a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.
episodes.title: The Painted Lady

episodes.synopsis: When Sokka feels he's not contributing enough to the group, he seeks out a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.
episodes.title: Sokka's Master

episodes.synopsis: Zuko, Azula, Mai and Ty Lee go on vacation, where they learn a lot about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, the kids face a new enemy.
episodes.title: The Beach

episodes.synopsis: Aang and Zuko are given insight into their forefathers' pasts -- but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?
episodes.title: The Avatar and the Firelord

episodes.synopsis: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.
episodes.title: The Runaway

episodes.synopsis: The kids investigate mysterious disappearances in a spooky town. Katara makes a special connection.
episodes.title: The Puppetmaster

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.
episodes.title: Nightmares and Daydreams

episodes.synopsis: With the day of the eclipse upon them, the kids -- along with a ragtag force of old friends -- enact their long-planned invasion of the Fire Nation.
episodes.title: Day of the Black Sun

episodes.synopsis: When our gang regroups at the Western Air temple, they find someone there they weren't expecting.
episodes.title: The Western Air Temple

episodes.synopsis: When it comes time for Zuko to teach Aang Firebending, the two set out to learn the true meaning of Firebending from the original teachers.
episodes.title: The Firebending Masters

episodes.synopsis: Sokka and Zuko hope to break out the captured invasion force from prison, but have to rethink their escape plan after things go wrong.
episodes.title: The Boiling Rock

episodes.synopsis: Katara sets out to confront the Fire Nation soldier who killed her mother. But what will she do when she finds him?
episodes.title: The Southern Raiders

episodes.synopsis: The kids see a play about themselves and all their past adventures. But they aren't happy with the production.
episodes.title: The Ember Island Players

episodes.synopsis: In the climactic series finale, Zuko confronts Azula, and Aang finally faces the Firelord.
episodes.title: Sozin's Comet
